name: Purulia District Agragami Mahila O Sisu Mangal Samiti
briefDescription: Purulia District AgragamiMahila O SisuMangalSamiti (PDAMSMS) is a social organisation based in Jargo block in Purulia district functioning from 1993 by a group of enthusiastic, hardworking women and now it has completed 23 years in social development.   We have huge experiences in Adolescent Health, Reproductive Health, Water & Sanitation, TB, HIV/AIDS, Community /Rural Development, Education & other Community based programmes. We have been closely working with different government and non-government organisation namely PHE, P&RD, and H&FW Dept. Gov. of W.B. NRHM, NABARD, Govt. of India, CARE, GLRA, DFID and UNICEF etc.
